name: Can't beat them up
description:
"Made for GMTK 2018 jam"

Your sensei told you not to use violence, find another way to beat opponent ,make them hit each other or lure them to traps.

All enemies must be eliminated in order to advance .

if you have problem with "hitcollision" in the browser version try the exe version(it works).

Controls:

- C to roll.

- X to skip cutscenes .

- R to restart the current frame.
